hero.name: Alexandre
hero.description: Full Stack Web Developer & UI/UX Designer

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate and Creative Developer
about.p1: I am a full stack web developer passionate about creating modern and high-performance web applications. With solid experience in both frontend and backend technologies, I turn ideas into innovative digital solutions.
about.p2: My approach combines deep technical expertise with a keen eye for design and user experience. I believe the best code is not only functional but also elegant and maintainable.

project1.title: E-commerce Platform
project1.desc: Modern e-commerce platform with React and Node.js

project2.title: Fitness App
project2.desc: Mobile fitness tracking app using React Native

project5.title: Weather App
project5.desc: Weather app with forecasts and animations

project6.title: Portfolio Design
project6.desc: UI/UX design for a creative portfolio

item1.desc: Development of complex web applications, microservices architecture, mentoring junior team, performance optimization.

item2.desc: Creation of modern user interfaces, React development, collaboration with designers, API integration.

item3.desc: Website development, maintenance of existing code, learning best practices, participating in team meetings.

item4.desc: Studies in web development, algorithms, databases, practical projects and final internship.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.subtitle: Let's discuss your project
contact.p: I am always interested in new opportunities and collaborations. Feel free to contact me to discuss your ideas or projects.
contact.formSuccess: Message sent successfully! I will get back to you as soon as possible.
